etymology.description: 孚(孚) (fú, "trust") as semantic part + 劉(劉) (liú, "to kill") as phonetic part = meaning related to concept or sound of 劉
etymology.interpretation: The character 㐬 combines the meaning of 孚(孚) (fú, "trust") with the phonetic component 劉(劉) (liú, "to kill") for a specific meaning or sound related to existing lexicon or function in classical texts.

examples.chinese: 小溪㐬流不断(小溪㐬流不斷)。
山间雾气沉沉(山間霧氣沉沉)，晨曦中云朵㐬散(晨曦中雲朵㐬散)。
examples.pinyin: Shānjiān wùqì chénchén, chénxī zhōng yúnduǒ liú sàn.
examples.english: The mountain mist hangs heavy, while at dawn the clouds disperse.

examples.chinese: 古城河畔(古城河畔)，时光将往事㐬进(時光將往事㐬進)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔchéng hépàn, shíguāng jiāng wǎngshì liú jìn.
examples.english: By the ancient city's riverbank, time carries memories along.
